Row.Text: +4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Resource. Shawnee Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on Vegetated Terrain not adjacent to another Mawaskawe Skote.
Shawnee Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on Vegetated Terrain not adjacent to another Mawaskawe Skote.
+4 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. +3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production to all Unique Improvements in this Settlement. Must be placed in Grassland.
+3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production to all Unique Improvements in this Settlement. Must be placed in Grassland.
"Our Creator sang to us in the wind and the running water, in the bird songs, in children's laughter, and taught us music."
